price: Tena hakika Sisi tunawajua vyema zaidi wanao stahiki kuunguzwa humo.
arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيّٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma lanaḥnu aʿlamu bi-alladhīna hum awlā bihā ṣiliyyan
